home.quote: The greatest glory of the people is its writers
home.author: Benjamin Jonson
home.about: Our project was created to acquaint a wide audience with outstanding Belarusian writers and their works. Our team collected the most important information about poets and presented it in a visual form. Our goal is to draw maximum attention to the classics of Belarusian literature, because we are sure that it is extremely important to know and remember legendary personalities.

error.details: The page you are looking for might have been removed had its name changed or is temporarily unavailable.
